summary: Completed comprehensive testing of FocusFlow role system extension. Backend APIs fully functional with 26/26 tests passing. Role-based exercise filtering working correctly - individual users see 15 exercises, teachers see 26 exercises. Frontend authentication flow and landing page working properly. All 27 exercises present in database with proper group/individual categorization.
passed_tests: Role update API endpoint (/profile/role) - switches between individual/teacher
Role-based exercise filtering - individual users see 15 exercises (9 active + 7 relaxed)
Role-based exercise filtering - teachers see 26 exercises (15 active + 12 relaxed)
Group exercise filtering - individual users don't see group exercises
Group exercise filtering - teachers see 11 group exercises (6 active + 5 relaxed)
Role persistence - role changes are saved to database
Invalid role validation - rejects invalid role values
All existing backend APIs still functional (auth, sessions, stats, exercise generation)
Frontend landing page loads with German text and proper styling
Authentication flow redirects correctly to Emergent Auth provider
Feature cards display correctly (Timer, Active Pausen, Entspannungspausen, Statistiken)
Database contains 27 exercises total with proper categorization

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (landing page, auth flow, UI elements working)
success_percentage.integration: 100% (role system fully integrated with exercise filtering)
